sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select NVL(substr(result309.aclose_dt,0 , 8) , '') AS day_close_date ,NVL(result309.trans_id, '') AS tr_trans_id ,NVL(result309.card_id, '') AS card_id ,NVL(result309.mobile_no, '') AS mobile_no ,NVL(result309.bef_amt, '0') AS tr_bef_amt ,NVL(result309.chg_amt, '0') AS tr_req_amt ,NVL(result309.aft_amt, '0') AS tr_aft_amt ,NVL(result309.fee, '0') AS tr_fee_amt ,NVL( case when (result309.chg_yn = 'Y' and result309.chg_yn != 'NN') then '한국스마트카드 마감' when (result309.chg_yn = 'H' and result309.ERR_YN !='NN' ) then '미확인' else '마감 오류' end ,'') AS tr_result_cd ,NVL(result309.entpri_cd, '') AS tr_entpri_cd ,NVL(cd1.cd_nm, '') AS paymethod_nm ,NVL(result309.event_cd, '') AS event_cd ,NVL((substr(result309.req_dt,1,8) ||' ' ||substr(result309.req_dt,9,2) ||':' || substr(result309.req_dt,11,2) || ':' || substr(result309.req_dt,13,2)) ,'') as tr_req_dtime , result309.entpri_name ,ROWNUM AS RNUM from ( select * from ( select * from charge.tbyih309
where aclose_dt between concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999')
and card_id = #search_card_id#
and trans_id = #search_trans_id#
and MOBILE_NO = #search_cust_tel#
) h309 where 1=1
and mtelcm_cd = #search_mtelcm_cd# -- TS00000003(MK100301,SKT) , TS00000005(MK100302 , KT), TS00000007(MK100303 ,LGU)
and h309.chg_yn = 'Y' and h309.chg_yn != 'NN'
and (h309.chg_yn = 'H' and h309.ERR_YN !='NN')
and ( h309.chg_yn != 'Y' and (h309.chg_yn != 'H' or h309.chg_yn = 'H' and h309.ERR_YN='NN') )
and h309.sid in ($payMethod_arr$) -- 46
and h309.sid not in ('09','11')
) result309 LEFT JOIN app_cp_code cd1 ON cd1.cd = result309.sid AND cd1.group_cd = 'PAYMETHOD' LEFT JOIN app_cp_code cd2 ON cd2.cd = result309.event_cd AND cd2.group_cd = 'EVENTDTLCD' order by result309.req_dt desc )
WHERE RNUM > #startNum# AND RNUM <= #endNum#

select count(*) as TOT_CNT ,sum(chg_amt) as TOT_AMT from ( select * from ( select * from charge.tbyih309 where aclose_dt between concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999')
and card_id = #search_card_id#
and trans_id = #search_trans_id#
and MOBILE_NO = #search_cust_tel#
) h309 where 1=1
and mtelcm_cd = #search_mtelcm_cd# -- TS00000003(MK100301,SKT) , TS00000005(MK100302 , KT), TS00000007(MK100303 ,LGU)
and h309.chg_yn = 'Y' and h309.chg_yn != 'NN'
and (h309.chg_yn = 'H' and h309.ERR_YN !='NN')
and ( h309.chg_yn != 'Y' and (h309.chg_yn != 'H' or h309.chg_yn = 'H' and h309.ERR_YN='NN') )
and h309.sid in ($payMethod_arr$) -- 46
and h309.sid not in ('09','11')
) result309 LEFT JOIN app_cp_code cd1 ON cd1.cd = result309.sid AND cd1.group_cd = 'PAYMETHOD' LEFT JOIN app_cp_code cd2 ON cd2.cd = result309.event_cd AND cd2.group_cd = 'EVENTDTLCD' order by result309.req_dt desc

select * from ( select RETURN_VALUE.* ,ROWNUM AS RNUM from ( (SELECT /*+index(app_txn_chg IDX_TXN_CHG_01) */ CHG_SER AS CHG_SER -- 거래번호 , P_METHOD -- 거래수단코드 , PG_AMT -- PG사거래금액 , PG_TR_NO -- PG사 승인번호 , CARD_ID -- 카드번호 , MOBILE_NO -- 핸드폰 번호 , BFR_AMT -- 충전전 금액 , FEE_AMT -- 수수료 , CHG_AMT -- 충전금액 , AFT_AMT -- 충전후 금액 , SIGN2 -- HSM인증여부 , CASE WHEN PG_TR_NO IS NULL THEN '미승인' WHEN STATUS IN ('05', 'A5' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인후취소' WHEN STATUS IN ('04' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' ELSE '승인' END AS STATUS_TR -- 승인상태 , CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('04', '14' ) THEN '미확인' WHEN STATUS IN ('05', 'A5' ) THEN '성공' WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) THEN '실패' ELSE '실패' END AS STATUS_CHG -- 충전상태 , CASE WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '05' OR CHG_CARD LIKE '15' THEN '신한신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '35' THEN '신한체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '01' THEN '우리신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '31' THEN '우리체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '02' OR CHG_CARD LIKE '24' THEN '하나신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '32' THEN '하나체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '09' THEN '롯데신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '39' THEN '롯데체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '03' THEN '외환신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '33' THEN '외환체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '06' THEN '국민신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '36' THEN '국민체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '04' THEN '삼성신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '34' THEN '삼성체크' ELSE '비제휴카드' END AS CHG_CARD_GUBUN -- 카드구분 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQ_DH, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DH -- 거래일시 , CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REG_DH, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '' END AS STATUS_DATE -- 취소일시 , CHG_CARD , STATUS , PG_RES_CD , PG_RES_MSG , CASE WHEN substr(req_dh,9,2) < '15' and substr(REG_DH,9,2) < '15' and substr(req_dh,7,2) = substr(REG_DH,7,2) THEN 'KSCC' WHEN substr(req_dh,9,2) < '24' and substr(REG_DH,9,2) < '24' and substr(req_dh,7,2) = substr(REG_DH,7,2) THEN 'KSCC' ELSE 'NO_KSCC' END AS KSCC_GUBUN ,'succData' as dataGubun FROM APP_TXN_CHG WHERE REQ_DH BETWEEN concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999') -- 성공 미확인 일시 기준 AND STATUS NOT IN ('01', '02', '03', 'D1','D2','C1','C2','D5', 'C5' ) -- 성공 미확인 데이터만 AND CHG_CARD IN ('05', '15', '35', '01', '31', '02', '24', '32', '09', '39', '03', '33', '06', '36', '04', '34' ) AND PG_RES_CD NOT IN ('008', 'X' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL and SIGN2 is not null ) union all (SELECT /*+index(app_txn_chg IDX_TXN_CHG_01) */ CHG_SER AS CHG_SER -- 거래번호 , P_METHOD -- 거래수단코드 , PG_AMT -- PG사거래금액 , PG_TR_NO -- PG사 승인번호 , CARD_ID -- 카드번호 , MOBILE_NO -- 핸드폰 번호 , BFR_AMT -- 충전전 금액 , FEE_AMT -- 수수료 , CHG_AMT -- 충전금액 , AFT_AMT -- 충전후 금액 , SIGN2 -- HSM인증여부 , CASE WHEN PG_TR_NO IS NULL THEN '미승인' WHEN STATUS IN ('05', 'A5' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인후취소' WHEN STATUS IN ('04' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL THEN '승인' ELSE '승인' END AS STATUS_TR -- 승인상태 , CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('04', '14' ) THEN '미확인' WHEN STATUS IN ('05', 'A5' ) THEN '성공' WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) THEN '실패' ELSE '실패' END AS STATUS_CHG -- 충전상태 , CASE WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '05' OR CHG_CARD LIKE '15' THEN '신한신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '35' THEN '신한체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '01' THEN '우리신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '31' THEN '우리체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '02' OR CHG_CARD LIKE '24' THEN '하나신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '32' THEN '하나체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '09' THEN '롯데신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '39' THEN '롯데체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '03' THEN '외환신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '33' THEN '외환체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '06' THEN '국민신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '36' THEN '국민체크' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '04' THEN '삼성신용' WHEN CHG_CARD LIKE '34' THEN '삼성체크' ELSE '비제휴카드' END AS CHG_CARD_GUBUN -- 카드구분 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQ_DH, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DH -- 거래일시 , CASE WHEN STATUS IN ('C5', 'D5' ) THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REG_DH, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '' END AS STATUS_DATE -- 취소일시 , CHG_CARD , STATUS , PG_RES_CD , PG_RES_MSG , CASE WHEN substr(req_dh,9,2) < '15' and substr(REG_DH,9,2) < '15' and substr(req_dh,7,2) = substr(REG_DH,7,2) THEN 'KSCC' WHEN substr(req_dh,9,2) < '24' and substr(REG_DH,9,2) < '24' and substr(req_dh,7,2) = substr(REG_DH,7,2) THEN 'KSCC' ELSE 'NO_KSCC' END AS KSCC_GUBUN ,'failData' as dataGubun FROM APP_TXN_CHG WHERE REG_DH BETWEEN concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999') -- 취소데이터 => 취소일시 기준 AND STATUS IN ('D1','D2','C1','C2','D5', 'C5' ) -- 취소데이터 => 실패 데이터 제외, 취소 데이터만 AND CHG_CARD IN ('05', '15', '35', '01', '31', '02', '24', '32', '09', '39', '03', '33', '06', '36', '04', '34' ) AND PG_RES_CD NOT IN ('008', 'X' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL and SIGN2 is not null ) ) RETURN_VALUE )
WHERE RNUM > #startNum# AND RNUM <= #endNum#

select count(*) as TOT_CNT ,sum(case when dataGubun='succData' then '1' else '0' end) as SUCC_TOT_CNT ,sum(case when dataGubun='failData' then '1' else '0' end) as FAIL_TOT_CNT from ( (SELECT /*+index(app_txn_chg IDX_TXN_CHG_01) */ 'succData' as dataGubun FROM APP_TXN_CHG WHERE REQ_DH BETWEEN concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999') -- 성공 미확인 일시 기준 AND STATUS NOT IN ('01', '02', '03', 'D1','D2','C1','C2','D5', 'C5' ) -- 성공 미확인 데이터만 AND CHG_CARD IN ('05', '15', '35', '01', '31', '02', '24', '32', '09', '39', '03', '33', '06', '36', '04', '34' ) AND PG_RES_CD NOT IN ('008', 'X' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL and SIGN2 is not null ) union all (SELECT /*+index(app_txn_chg IDX_TXN_CHG_01) */ 'failData' as dataGubun FROM APP_TXN_CHG WHERE REG_DH BETWEEN concat(#start_dt#,'000000') and concat(#end_dt#,'999999') -- 취소데이터 => 취소일시 기준 AND STATUS IN ('D1','D2','C1','C2','D5', 'C5' ) -- 취소데이터 => 실패 데이터 제외, 취소 데이터만 AND CHG_CARD IN ('05', '15', '35', '01', '31', '02', '24', '32', '09', '39', '03', '33', '06', '36', '04', '34' ) AND PG_RES_CD NOT IN ('008', 'X' ) AND PG_TR_NO IS NOT NULL and SIGN2 is not null ) )
